shortForecast: Areas Of Drizzle then Light Rain
name: Today
detailedForecast: Areas of drizzle and areas of fog and a chance of rain before 10am, then rain and areas of drizzle and areas of fog between 10am and 4pm, then areas of fog and a chance of rain. Cloudy, with a high near 49. Southwest wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
